summary: A brief email sent from an iPad on July 13, 2019, proposing a future chat about substantive and procedural matters related to Epstein, indicating ongoing discussions or planning.

events.title: Email proposing chat about Epstein matters
events.description: An email is sent proposing a chat about substantive and procedural matters related to Epstein, ideally on the upcoming Monday or Tuesday.

keyFacts: The email is dated July 13, 2019, shortly before Jeffrey Epstein's arrest on July 6, 2019, and his death on August 10, 2019.
The sender proposes a chat about 'some things' related to Epstein, described as both substantive and procedural.
The email is marked as 'Nothing urgent' and was sent from an iPad.
The correspondence indicates ongoing discussions or planning regarding Epstein's case around this critical time period.
The specific sender and recipient are not named in the provided text.
